Most important read of the day: An incredible piece by #NY21 @ncpr @EmilyRussellADK on local Holocaust survivor Vladimir Munk returning to Auschwitz 75 years after the camp‚Äôs liberation. We must never stop telling & teaching these horrific and heartbreaking stories of survivors. https://twitter.com/npr/status/1220474070883618816 QT @NPR Vladimir Munk is returning to Auschwitz for the first time since he walked free from the concentration camp 75 years ago. 

His parents were killed there, as were most of his family members.

"So, for me, it's like going to the family cemetery," he says. https://www.npr.org/2020/01/23/798242097/holocaust-survivor-returning-to-auschwitz-it-s-like-going-to-the-family-cemetery?utm_source=twitter.com&utm_campaign=npr&utm_medium=social&utm_term=nprnews
